>
[Phoenix Fighting Fan](/Equipment.aspx?ID=945)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 75</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Fighting Fan](/Weapons.aspx?ID=93)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elegant _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379) [fighting fan](/Weapons.aspx?ID=93)_ features sharp silver feathers instead of traditional paper leaves in its design.
